rule.name: SI_IND_RecordDashboard
rule.definition: load( local!InterfaceId: #"_a-0000ddf0-5b70-8000-9ccd-01ef9001ef90_40114"( "_a-0000ddf0-5b70-8000-9ccd-01ef9001ef90_40197" ), with( local!data: #"_a-0000ddf3-bb41-8000-9ccd-01ef9001ef90_40572"( ri!Id ), local!contactDetails: #"_a-0000ddf3-bb41-8000-9ccd-01ef9001ef90_40580"( index( local!data, "ContactId", "" ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout"( firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( label: index(local!data,"FirstName","")&" "&index(local!data,"LastName",""), firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: #"_a-0000ddf0-5b70-8000-9ccd-01ef9001ef90_40187"( "firstName", local!InterfaceId ), labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: index( local!data, "FirstName", "" ), readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: #"_a-0000ddf0-5b70-8000-9ccd-01ef9001ef90_40187"( "lastName", local!InterfaceId ), labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: index( local!data, "LastName", "" ), readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: #"_a-0000ddf0-5b70-8000-9ccd-01ef9001ef90_40187"( "designation", local!InterfaceId ), labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: index( local!data, "Designation", "" ), readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: #"_a-0000ddf0-5b70-8000-9ccd-01ef9001ef90_40187"( "department", local!InterfaceId ), labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: index( local!data, "Department", "" ), readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: #"_a-0000ddf0-5b70-8000-9ccd-01ef9001ef90_40187"( "dob", local!InterfaceId ), labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: todate( index( local!data, "DOB", "" ) ), readOnly: true ) }, secondColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_imageField"( label: "", images: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"( document: #"_a-0000ddf0-5b70-8000-9ccd-01ef9001ef90_40202" ), size: "SMALL", labelPosition: "ADJACENT" ) } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( label: #"_a-0000ddf0-5b70-8000-9ccd-01ef9001ef90_40187"( "contactDet", local!InterfaceId ), firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: #"_a-0000ddf0-5b70-8000-9ccd-01ef9001ef90_40187"( "personalNumber", local!InterfaceId ), labelPosition: local!InterfaceId ), labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: index( local!contactDetails, "OfficialNumber", "" ), readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: #"_a-0000ddf0-5b70-8000-9ccd-01ef9001ef90_40187"( "faxNumber", local!InterfaceId ), labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: index( local!contactDetails, "FaxNumber", "" ), readOnly: true ) }, secondColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: #"_a-0000ddf0-5b70-8000-9ccd-01ef9001ef90_40187"( "personalEmail", local!InterfaceId ), labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: index( local!contactDetails, "PersonalEmail", "" ), readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: #"_a-0000ddf0-5b70-8000-9ccd-01ef9001ef90_40187"( "officialEmail", local!InterfaceId ), labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: index( local!contactDetails, "OfficialEmail", "" ), readOnly: true ) } ), #"_a-0000ddf0-5b70-8000-9ccd-01ef9001ef90_40204"( mainLabel:
